name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Takane Lui perform the song 'Animal'.
MC section where Marine and Lui discuss their 'sexy' vibes and Lui's 'ikemen' (cool guy) behavior.
Houshou Marine, Tokino Sora, and AZKi perform the song 'Yuzurenai Negai'.

subtitles.original: さあ、どうなっちゃうのか
subtitles.english: Well, what will happen?

subtitles.original: 見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me...

subtitles.original: 本能
subtitles.english: your instinct.

subtitles.original: どちらが勝つの？
subtitles.english: Which one will win?

subtitles.original: 理性と超絶【自主規制】で
subtitles.english: Reason or transcendent [Self-Censorship]

subtitles.original: 魅せてよ
subtitles.english: fascinate me.

subtitles.original: 本当はここを欲しがるくせに
subtitles.english: Even though you actually want this place.

subtitles.original: 嬉しいとか 気持ちいいとか
subtitles.english: Whether it's "happy" or "feels good",

subtitles.original: 所詮それは自己満足
subtitles.english: it's ultimately just self-satisfaction.

subtitles.original: 戯言を並べ立てて
subtitles.english: Lining up nonsensical words...

subtitles.original: 投げ捨てちゃっていいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Wouldn't it be okay to just throw them away?

subtitles.original: 思わせて
subtitles.english: Make me think so.

subtitles.original: もうぶっ飛んじゃったら良いでしょ
subtitles.english: It's fine if you just lose your mind already.

subtitles.original: 一体どこに不満があるの？
subtitles.english: Where on earth is the dissatisfaction?

subtitles.original: いっそうそうなったら逃がさない
subtitles.english: If it comes to that, I won't let you get away.

subtitles.original: だからね、ほらね、覚悟して
subtitles.english: So, you see, prepare yourself.

subtitles.original: さあ、どうなっちゃってもいいから
subtitles.english: Now, I don't care what happens,

subtitles.original: その目で最後まで見届けて
subtitles.english: so watch until the end with those eyes.

subtitles.original: どこまで行っても止まらない
subtitles.english: No matter how far we go, we won't stop.

subtitles.original: だけどね、でもね、そろそろ限界
subtitles.english: But, you see, it's almost the limit.

subtitles.original: ああもうだめ
subtitles.english: Ah, no more.

subtitles.original: あああああああ
subtitles.english: Ahhhhhhhhh
Ooooh~~~!

subtitles.original: いや、鷹嶺ルイにこの歌はもう本当にぴったりだと思ったんですが
subtitles.english: No, I thought this song was a perfect fit for Takane Lui, but...

subtitles.original: ガチでぴったりだったわ。
subtitles.english: it seriously was a perfect fit.

subtitles.original: え、嬉しい嬉しい。
subtitles.english: Eh, I'm happy, I'm happy.

subtitles.original: いや、でもマリン先輩もめちゃくちゃセクシーで素晴らしかったです。
subtitles.english: No, but Marine-senpai was also incredibly sexy and wonderful.

subtitles.original: いや、セクシーといえば船長、いや、もう本当にエロ女上司としての立場が
subtitles.english: No, speaking of sexy, Senchou... No, really, as a sexy adult woman boss,

subtitles.original: 危ぶまれてるの、こっち。
subtitles.english: my position is being threatened here.

subtitles.original: 鷹嶺ルイに今、処刑されてる。
subtitles.english: I'm being executed by Takane Lui right now.

subtitles.original: やだ！
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: 私セクシーだからなぁ。
subtitles.english: Well, I am sexy, after all.

subtitles.original: やだ何これスタイル良すぎる！
subtitles.english: No, look at this! Your figure is too good!

subtitles.original: これじゃマリンがロリータに見えちゃう！
subtitles.english: This makes Marine look like a lolita!

subtitles.original: いやマリン先輩、元々ロリですからね。
subtitles.english: Well Marine-senpai, you were a loli to begin with.
Eh!?

subtitles.original: ロリババアっていう感じで。
subtitles.english: Like a "Loli-Babaa" kind of vibe.

subtitles.original: マリン。
subtitles.english: Marine.

subtitles.original: 俺だけのババアになれよ。
subtitles.english: Become my "Babaa" alone.

subtitles.original: おばあちゃんなる...。
subtitles.english: I'll become your grandma...

subtitles.original: ルイちゃん、メガドライブ買ってあげるね。
subtitles.english: Lui-chan, I'll buy you a Mega Drive, okay?

subtitles.original: いや、メガドライブはちょっと古い...。
subtitles.english: No, Mega Drive is a bit old...

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: 譲れない願いを抱きしめて
subtitles.english: embracing a wish that cannot be yielded.

subtitles.original: あああああああああ
subtitles.english: Ahhhhhhhhhhh

subtitles.original: ゆずれない願い
subtitles.english: Unbreakable Wish

subtitles.original: 海の色が赤く染まってゆく
subtitles.english: The color of the sea is being dyed red,

subtitles.original: 無重力状態
subtitles.english: a state of zero gravity.

subtitles.original: このまま風にさらわれたい
subtitles.english: I want to be swept away by the wind just like this.

subtitles.original: いつも飛べないハードルを
subtitles.english: The hurdles I can never jump over,

subtitles.original: 負けない気持ちでクリアしてきたけど
subtitles.english: I've cleared them with a spirit that won't give up.

subtitles.original: 出しきれない実力は
subtitles.english: The potential I can't fully bring out,

subtitles.original: 誰のせい？
subtitles.english: whose fault is it?

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: 譲れない願いを抱きしめて
subtitles.english: embracing a wish that cannot be yielded.

subtitles.original: 色褪せない心の地図
subtitles.english: The map of my heart that won't fade,

subtitles.original: 光にかざそう
subtitles.english: let's hold it up to the light.

subtitles.original: どれだけ投げれば朝に出会えるの？
subtitles.english: How much must I cry out to meet the morning?

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜
subtitles.english: A lonely night.

subtitles.original: 初めて限界を感じた日
subtitles.english: The day I felt my limit for the first time.

subtitles.original: きっと恋に落ちるのは
subtitles.english: Surely, falling in love is

subtitles.original: 瞬きみたいな一瞬の情熱だけど
subtitles.english: an instantaneous passion like a blink, but...

subtitles.original: 愛に続く坂道で
subtitles.english: On the slope leading to love,

subtitles.original: 強さを覚えたい
subtitles.english: I want to learn strength.

subtitles.original: 止まらない未来を目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for a future that won't stop,

subtitles.original: 夢見て
subtitles.english: dreaming.

subtitles.original: 口を閉ざし 瞳を輝かせて
subtitles.english: Closing my mouth, making my eyes sparkle,

subtitles.original: 駆け抜ければ もっと大きな
subtitles.english: if I run through, a much bigger...

subtitles.original: 優しさに出会える
subtitles.english: kindness I will meet.
